events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my recent purchase. The product does not match the description at all.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to customer's refund request for a wrong product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund and return requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 987654321 and the photo attached clearly shows that the item is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process immediately and arrange for a prepaid return label to be sent to your email.
Thank you very much! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label soon.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is any further assistance you need from us.
Yes, I have received the refund. Everything went smoothly. Thank you for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
A quick survey about your support experience has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback.
